amendment.description: Amendment redirects $5 million in funding within the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration account for the purpose of providing for digital scanning of health and benefits files of veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $5 million in funding within the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Ruiz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
